name: Terrance L. SLAUGHTER, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, First Judicial District, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Slaughter v. Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas

parties: Terrance L. SLAUGHTER, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, First Judicial District, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of August, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Complaint in Mandamus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
930 A.2d 1264
Terrance L. SLAUGHTER, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, First Judicial District, Respondent.
No. 86 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 22, 2007.
